DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study explore efficacy feasibility integrate , prescriptive , trackable wellness intervention combine five wellness element include exercise , mindfulness , sleep , social connectedness , nutrition .
DOC.brief_title: WILD 5 Wellness : A 90-Day Intervention ( WILD = Wellness Interventions Life 's Demands )
DOC.detailed_description: This study involve participate 90-day integrate , prescriptive , trackable wellness intervention , include five wellness element : exercise , mindfulness , sleep , social connectedness , nutrition . The intervention divide three phase ( span 30-days ) : Phase 1 - 'Boot Camp ' , Phase 2 - Solidify , Phase 3 - Sustain . Program requirement include : Implementing 5 wellness intervention daily first 30-days , least 5 day next 30-days , least 3 day final 30-days , document daily online adherence , complete daily wellness exercise improve mental wellness , complete online program form prior begin program , 30-days , 90-days . Once eligibility confirm via initial orientation/screening call , study personnel mail participant WILD 5 Wellness Workbook within one day email participant unique identification code plus start date . Participants instruct document adherence regard daily wellness practice daily wellness exercise online via Qualtrics , online survey software . Participants document daily adherence use computer and/or smartphone Qualtrics offer mobile version Participant Tracking Form . A copy Participant Tracking Form also available WILD 5 Workbook participant prefer keep daily paper log , transfer program adherence information online Participant Tracking Form throughout program . The workbook contain participant 's personal identification code ; personal identification appear workbook order protect participant confidentiality . One day prior participant 's start date , set orientation/screening call , participant receive automate email online automate email service ( MailChimp ) , reminder start date , encouragement contact study personnel question concern . Participants also receive daily motivational email online automate email service ( MailChimp ) , provide general information one five wellness element and/or one wellness exercise , well encouragement track participation daily basis , encouragement contact study personnel via email question and/or concern .
DOC.criteria: Adults ( 18 year age old ) English speak Access reliable Internetenabled computer Possess basic computer skill Selfidentify least one health condition list online registration form Selfidentify community participant without health condition . Acutely suicidal and/or actively psychotic NonEnglish speaking Do access Internetenabled computer Report lack basic computer skill Pregnant plan get pregnant next 90days .
